description: Try our easy to follow Chicken, Leek & Veggie Bake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken bake,Low saturated fat,Roast,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Leftover chicken,Chicken,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Chicken, Leek & Veggie Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g skinless chicken breast fillets (cut into 2cm pieces)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium heat. Add chicken and cook for 6 minutes or until light golden. Reduce heat to low. Add leek and mustard, then cook, stirring, for 8 minutes or until golden and tender. Sprinkle over flour and cook, stirring, for a further 1 minute. Gradually stir in milk and ricotta, then bring to the boil. Stir in corn and season. Remove from heat. Transfer mixture to 20 x 26cm (4cm deep) roasting pan.

Place peas in a food processor and process until roughly crushed. Transfer to a bowl and add cauliflower, tossing to combine. Top chicken mixture with pea mixture, then bake for 55 minutes or until golden. Serve.
